patched_yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-9889
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      runAsNonRoot: true
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-9889
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/cache/nginx
      name: cache-volume
    - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
      name: log-volume
    securityContext:
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      runAsNonRoot: true
  securityContext:
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - name: cache-volume
    emptyDir: {}
  - name: log-volume
    emptyDir: {}

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: rollem-prod-20-deployment
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: rollem-prod
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: rollem-prod
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: rollem-shard-20
        image: lemtzas/rollem-discord:2.6.4
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 250M
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        env:
        - name: reboot
          value: '2021-04-20'
        - name: DISCORD_BOT_SHARD_ID
          value: '20'
        - name: DISCORD_BOT_SHARD_COUNT
          value: '50'
        - name: DISCORD_BOT_USER_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: rollem-prod-2
              key: DISCORD_BOT_USER_TOKEN
        - name: APPINSIGHTS_CONNECTIONSTRING
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: rollem-prod-2
              key: APPINSIGHTS_CONNECTIONSTRING
        - name: DEFER_TO_CLIENT_IDS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: rollem-prod-2
              key: DEFER_TO_CLIENT_IDS
        - name: DB_CONNECTION_STRING
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: rollem-prod-2
              key: DB_CONNECTION_STRING
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: digilocker-support-api
  name: digilocker-support-api
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: digilocker-support-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        k8s-app: digilocker-support-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: REGISTRY/digilocker_support_api:stable
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: digilocker-support-api
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: divoc-config
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  namespace: prow
  name: label-sync
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - name: label-sync
            image: gcr.io/k8s-prow/label_sync:v20210723-55eee17612
            args:
            - --config=/etc/config/labels.yaml
            - --confirm=true
            - --only=ti-community-infra/tichi,ti-community-infra/configs,ti-community-infra/ti-community-bot,ti-community-infra/ti-challenge-bot,ti-community-infra/rfcs,ti-community-infra/devstats,ti-community-infra/devstats-dev-guide,pingcap/community,pingcap/docs,pingcap/docs-cn,pingcap/docs-dm,pingcap/docs-tidb-operator,pingcap/ticdc,tikv/community,tikv/pd,chaos-mesh/website,chaos-mesh/website-zh
            - --token=/etc/github/token
            volumeMounts:
            - name: github-token
              mountPath: /etc/github
              readOnly: true
            - name: config
              mountPath: /etc/config
              readOnly: true
            securityContext:
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
              privileged: false
              capabilities:
                drop:
                - NET_RAW
                - NET_ADMIN
                - SYS_ADMIN
                - SYS_MODULE
                - SYS_PTRACE
                - SYS_CHROOT
              allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
              runAsNonRoot: true
            resources:
              requests:
                cpu: 100m
                memory: 128Mi
              limits:
                cpu: 500m
                memory: 256Mi
          volumes:
          - name: github-token
            secret:
              secretName: github-token
          - name: config
            configMap:
              name: labels-config
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: 0 0 * * *

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: smtp
  name: smtp
  namespace: utils
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: smtp
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: smtp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: devture/exim-relay:4.94.2-r0-3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: smtp
        env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Europe/Zurich
        - name: smtp.int.eighty-three.me
        - name: SMARTHOST
          value: smtp.sendgrid.net::587
        - name: SMTP_USERNAME
          value: apikey
        - name: SMTP_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: smtp-password
              key: password
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 10Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
            memory: 100Mi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8025
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - exim
            - -bt
            - test@tuxpeople.org
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: smtp
  name: smtp
  namespace: utils
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: smtp
  replicas: 1
  template:

    spec:

        imagePullPolicy: Always

        - name: smtp.int.eighty-three.me
        - name: SMARTHOST
          value: smtp.sendgrid.net::587
        - name: SMTP_USERNAME
          value: apikey
        - name: SMTP_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: smtp-password
              key: password
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 10Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
            memory: 100Mi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8025
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - exim
            - -bt
            - test@tuxpeople.org

          periodSeconds: 10
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true

patched_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: kube-sriov-device-plugin-amd64
  namespace: kube-system
  labels:
    tier: node
    app: sriovdp
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: sriov-device-plugin
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: sriov-device-plugin
        tier: node
        app: sriovdp
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: sriov-device-plugin
      containers:
      - name: kube-sriovdp
        image: docker.io/nfvpe/sriov-device-plugin:v3.1
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        args:
        - --log-dir=sriovdp
        - --log-level=10
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          runAsNonRoot: true
        volumeMounts:
        - name: devicesock
          mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/
          readOnly: false
        - name: log
          mountPath: /var/log
        - name: config-volume
          mountPath: /etc/pcidp
          readOnly: true
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
      volumes:
      - name: devicesock
        hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/
      - name: log
        emptyDir: {}
      - name: config-volume
        configMap:
          name: sriovdp-config
          items:
          - key: config.json
            path: config.json
